Package Database

package Database
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    JDBC
    The JDBC class creates and closes the connection to the database.
    QueryAppointment
    The QueryAppointment class is used to perform SQL operations on Appointment objects.
    QueryContact
    The QueryContact class is used to perform SQL operations on Contact objects.
    QueryCountry
    The QueryCountry class is used to perform SQL operations on Country objects.
    QueryCustomer
    The QueryCustomer class is used to perform SQL operations on Customer objects.
    QueryDatabase
    The QueryDatabase class sets and gets a prepared statement.
    QueryDivision
    The QueryDivision class is used to perform SQL operations on Division objects.
    QueryUser
    The QueryUser class is used to perform SQL operations on User objects.
